title: Marketplace for Friday, Feb. 6, 2015
description: Airing on Friday, Feb. 6, 2015: Goldman Sachs came in dead last in Harris Poll's annual corporate reputation survey. What does this mean for the company? Plus, the Labor Department's January jobs report shows a slight rise in unemployment along with rising wages and solid jobs growth. Who are the new members of this workforce and what jobs do they hold? Finally, Pope Francis will share his economic beliefs with the U.S. in a September address to Congress.
byline: Mitchell Hartman, Kai Ryssdal, Adam Allington, Tracey Samuelson, Nancy Marshall-Genzer and Tommy Andres
teaser: Airing on Friday, Feb. 6, 2015: Goldman Sachs came in dead last in Harris Poll's annual corporate reputation survey. What does this mean for the company?
